schema.name: user_profile
schema.description: Core user identity and program information for the 12-week personal development program

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for each user profile record

compliance.reason: Contains personal identity information and program participation data

fields.name: data_creator
fields.description: id of the user who creates the record

compliance.reason: Internal tracking field for audit purposes

fields.name: data_updater
fields.description: id of the user who updates the record

compliance.reason: Internal tracking field for audit purposes
Internal tracking field for audit purposes
Internal tracking field for audit purposes

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the user participating in the program

compliance.reason: Links to user account and personal program data

fields.name: core_identity_statement
fields.description: Large text field containing the user's core identity statement for the transformation program

compliance.reason: Highly personal identity and self-perception information

fields.name: program_start_date
fields.description: Date when the user started the 12-week program in timestamp unix string format

fields.name: current_week
fields.description: Current week number in the program (1-12)

compliance.reason: Tracks user's current progress in the program

fields.name: current_phase
fields.description: Current phase number in the program (1-3)
